metadata.name: Deconstructed Murder #1 (Barret M82-Skull)
metadata.description:
One of the 25 most common murders.  
4500 X 8000 PIXELS = 62,5 X 111 INCHES = 1,60 X 2,80 METERS

¨ I try to generate an aesthetically pleasing  
visual impact with an image that would,  
in its bare form, be disturbing and negative.  
The collection is a series of 25 of the most  
common murders. Each piece is composed  
of a weapons, impacted organ, particles,  
explosions and bullets in the case of firearms.  
I take base images of the different elements  
and run them through the same transformation  
pattern, and then recompose the piece out  
of the deconstructed parts ¨. HJ
